code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PlaceOrder(_ref){let{contract,accounts}=_ref;const[productIds,setProductIds]=useState([]);const[quantities,setQuantities]=useState([]);const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const totalCost=await contract.methods.placeOrder(productIds,quantities).call({from:accounts[0]});await contract.methods.placeOrder(productIds,quantities).send({from:accounts[0],value:totalCost});alert("Order placed successfully!");setProductIds([]);setQuantities([]);};const addProduct=()=>{setProductIds([...productIds,0]);setQuantities([...quantities,0]);};const updateProductId=(index,value)=>{const newProductIds=[...productIds];newProductIds[index]=value;setProductIds(newProductIds);};const updateQuantity=(index,value)=>{const newQuantities=[...quantities];newQuantities[index]=value;setQuantities(newQuantities);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Place Order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[productIds.map((productId,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Product ID:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:productId,onChange:e=>updateProductId(index,parseInt(e.target.value)),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Quantity:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:quantities[index],onChange:e=>updateQuantity(index,parseInt(e.target.value)),required:true})]})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:addProduct,children:"Add Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Place Order"})]})]});}export default PlaceOrder;
